rows.name: text_instruction
rows.value: Paste the @local.facilitator_id of a user to import their account data.

rows.name: button_import
rows.action_list:
click | user: import: @local.user_id_input;
click | emit: force_reprocess;

rows.name: button
rows.action_list:
click | set_field: user_name: ;
click | emit: force_reprocess;

rows.name: text
rows.value: If you had set a user name on your old account and the data was imported succesfully, the user name above should update.
